Michael Stack wrote:
> Looks great Frank. Would be sweet addition to Heritrix. Send over a
> patch so we can take a look at whats involved integrating.

Will do.  I'll add/clean up my comments, etc. to make it more readable.


> Otherwise:
> 
> + Separating DNS from HTTP seems like it would make for easier reading.
> HTTPS is mixed in with HTTP I assume?

Yes


> + In crawl_report1.html, the 'Status code', 'MIME type', and 'Hosts'
> column members are clickable and take me to what looks like a page that
> will draw out a grep of log content? Is that right?

Yes


> + In 'seeds_report.html', the 'Status code and Disposition' column has
> the description text as links taking me to the grep-of-logs page. Is
> that what you intended? (I like the feature where you mix in the
> redirect page as a link so can take a quick look at where the crawler
> was directed).

Yes


> Good stuff,
> St.Ack
>
